mods.abstract: WMMN's Sagebrush Roundup radio program, Philip Morris Tobacco audition part 2 (incomplete recording). Featuring the Trail Blazers (Jack Dunigan, Gertrude Miller, with Earl 'Little' Sampson), Enoch 'Eli' Haney, Sammy Nancy (accordionist, spelling unconfirmed), Uncle Rufus (comedian), the Blue Bonnet Girls, Arizona Rusty Gabbard (Arthur Gabbard), and host Howard Hopkins Wolfe. Recording begins with a false start of the opening theme.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
